summary:
Technology expert and transformation specialist with >20 years of experience with Big 4 / Big Tech consulting.
Background in process reengineering, shared services implementations, operating model transformations and multi-national system implementations in the consumer products, pharma and transportation industry mostly. Extensive experience in transformation of operations while running operations (F&A and procurement Business Process Outsourcing - BPO).
Gets energy from achieving a result for the company while growing the team's skills and experience and personally growing. Values integrity and open environments.

profile_positions.description: Various business development, project management and internal roles supporting Accenture's Strategy & Consulting - CFO & Enterprise Value team in The Netherlands
profile_positions.title: Managing Director Strategy & Consulting - CFO & Enterprise Value

profile_positions.description:
Sales and Account Management for Accenture Operations. Responsible for business development as well as account management. Specialized in management of large, offshore, transformational outsourcing assignments with experience in overseeing Delivery Centers in all continents. Including a period of 110M€ P&L responsibility for the Dutch entity. 

Roles during this period:

Operations Account Manager – Dutch (American) logistics company 
Account management end responsible for a global finance and accounting and data management outsourcing assignment with a logistics company. Accenture was responsible for operating all transactional finance and data management processes for this logistics client for circa 50 countries with 2500+ FTE’s from 10 delivery centres (a.o. in India, China, Eastern Europe and Africa). This included the take-over of three captive delivery centres and transition of circa 1500 additional FTE’s.   

Global Purchase to Pay Transformation and Outsourcing Program Manager – Global Communication Company 
Overall responsible for the implementation of a new PtP platform (Coupa) globally, with procurement operations and accounts payable outsourced to India and Slovakia. This project included substantial transformation and reorganization of the procurement function. 

Lead Operations - Accenture The Netherlands
Responsible for the P&L of the Dutch Operations (BPO) business unit of Accenture. 

Outsourcing Account Delivery Manager – Dutch logistics company 
Account management for a global finance and accounting outsourcing assignment with a logistics company. Accenture was responsible for operating all transactional finance processes for this logistics client for over 30 countries with 500+ FTE’s from four delivery centres (in India, China, Argentina and Romania).
profile_positions.title: Managing Director - Accenture Operations (BPO)

profile_positions.description:
Roles:

Project Manager Revenue Management project – US pharma
Implementation for all non-US subsidiaries incl. software selection and fit/gap to local processes. Supported vendor in development of localizations for 25+ countries.

Project Manager Support Centre Strategic vision – US pharma
Developed a worldwide support center operating model and implementation roadmap.

SME chart of accounts FMCG – Dutch brewer
Project to change the profit and loss statement (P&L) by nature to a P&L by function. Incl. impact assessment.

Local implementation manager operating model – Anglo-Dutch food, household and personal care 
Implementation of tax optimized operating model supported by SAP. Responsible for the Swiss principal entity (responsible for European production and distribution) incl. BPO and AMO.

Project manager for the vision on standardization – Dutch dairy
Process harmonization study, incl. recommendations on future application architecture for Europe.

Category manager strategic purchasing program – Dutch animal feed
For a strategic sourcing project I led three categories; travel, transport and communication expenses.

Project manager Risk Management Audit – US pharma
Documenting and testing risk controls as preparation for an internal audit.

Project manager application architecture for marketing – US office supply
Replacement and standardization of the applications for marketing support – marketing budget management, campaign management and loyalty programs.

Manager implementation Shared Services – US pharma
Transition of financial processes of Poland, Czech Republic and Hungary in the European SSC in The Netherlands.

Consultant vision on world class finance function – Dutch retailer
Study into the vision of the goal, the function and structure of the worldwide financial function for the CFO of Europe.

Consultant strategic cost study – Dutch railway maintenance
Strategic study into the cost saving opportunities. Work group lead rail station maintenance.
profile_positions.title: Senior manager - Products Industry

profile_positions.description:
Roles during this period:

Consultant business case and financial process design for a centralised and tax optimised operating model – Anglo-Dutch company in foods and household and personal care
Design and implementation of a centralised model for control of the supply chain with tax advantages by setting up a new entity in Switzerland. My role was subject matter expert for tax efficient models, to provide input to design of new processes and to create a business case. Next to this I was responsible for building a financial model that was used to substantiate the business case for change and as a mechanism to cross charge costs to the commercial units in a way that was fiscally justified. 

Project manager implementation financial system – Dutch producer of baby and clinical food 
The design and the implementation of a financial system for a new legal entity of this company was a follow-on project after the development of a new operating model that created a tax optimised structure, transparent margins for sales units and a better control of the value of goods across the value chain. I was responsible for the system delivery and the commercial activities towards this customer. 
After this project I was responsible for a project to standardise article numbers and their cost prices. 

Project manager JD Edwards – world leader in the provision of international mail services to businesses
Feasibility study and subsequent implementation of a new financial application in 22 countries globally. With the help of an IBM partner I sold the project and ran the implementation. 

Consultant business case supply chain redesign – Finish supplier of packaging materials
Redesign of the European logistical flow and supply chain operating model. I created the business case for the change program to change the organisation, I provided subject matter expertise for financial process redesign and I set up a process for benefit target setting and tracking.
profile_positions.title: Senior Consultant

profile_positions.description:
Roles during this period:

EMEA South financial implementation lead – Compliance and ship certification company 
World wide standardisation of operational processes and implementation of an ERP system. Based in Athens (Greece) I was responsible for the financial processes and system for France, Spain, Italy and Greece. 

Implementation manager ‘principal’ – American pharmaceutical company
Development of a new operating model with tax advantages. This led to a ‘principal-commissionaire’ set up in Switzerland. As implementation manager I led the development of the operating model and the processes design and the implementation of an ERP system.

Implementation manager Italy – American pharmaceutical company
Implementation of the financial module of JD Edwards in Italy. I was responsible for managing the take over of a part of the financial processes by the European financial Shared Service Centre. 

Team lead Accounts Receivable & Intercompany – American pharmaceutical company
Implementation of JD Edwards, as first phase of a pan-European project to redesign processes and implement ERP software. Part of the project was to design and implement a financial Shared Service Centre in Dublin. 

Project lead financial module JD Edwards – secondment agency for the top part of the market
This was one of the follow-on projects under the holding of this company. The goal of the holding was to roll out a European model to standardise the financial processes. 

Team lead Accounts Payable – Temporary labour agency 
Development and implementation of a European financial standard model in JD Edwards OneWorld. This model was rolled out to all European entities under this holding. 

Consultant information management – social insurance company
Creation of an information plan and the information strategy. 

Junior consultant SAP R/3 implementation – rental company of industrial cranes
Under the guidance of a senior consultant I designed and implemented the maintenance organisation.
